contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | fossil_range = {{fossilrange|104|0|ref=<ref>{{cite journal | last = Sepkoski | first = Jack | authorlink = | coauthors = | title = A compendium of fossil marine animal genera (Chondrichthyes entry) | journal = Bulletins of American Paleontology | volume = 364 | issue = | pages = p.560 | publisher = | location = | date = 2002 | url = http://strata.ummp.lsa.umich.edu/jack/showgenera.php?taxon=575&rank=class | doi = | id = | accessdate = 2008-01-09 }}</ref>}} <small>Late [[Albian]] to Present<small> | image = Scyliorhinus canicula.jpg | image_width = 240px | image_caption = [[Small-spotted catshark|Small-spotted catshark (''S. canicula'')]] | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Chondrichthyes]] | subclassis = [[Elasmobranchii]] | ordo = [[Carcharhiniformes]] | familia = [[Scyliorhinidae]] | genus = '''''Scyliorhinus''''' | genus_authority = [[Henri Marie Ducrotay de Blainville|Blainville]], 1816 | type_species = [[Small-spotted catshark|''Squalus canicula'']] | type_species_authority = Linnaeus, 1758 }} {{Portal|Sharks}} '''''Scylorhinus''''' is a [[genus]] of [[catshark]]s in the [[Family (biology)|family]] [[Scyliorhinidae]]. ==Species== [[File:Scyliorhinus elongatus AMNH 13983.jpg|thumb|A fossil of the extinct species ''Scyliorhinus elongatus'' ([[AMNH]] 13983)]] * ''[[Scyliorhinus besnardi]]'' <small>[[Stewart Springer|S. Springer]] & [[Victor Sadowsky|Sadowsky]], 1970</small> (Polkadot catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus boa]]'' <small>[[George Brown Goode|Goode]] & [[Tarleton Hoffman Bean|T. H. Bean]], 1896</small> (Boa catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus canicula]]'' <small>([[Carl Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758)</small> (Small-spotted catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus capensis]]'' <small>([[Johannes Peter Müller|J. P. Müller]] & [[Friedrich Gustav Jakob Henle|Henle]], 1838)</small> (Yellow-spotted catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus cervigoni]]'' <small>[[Claude Maurin|Maurin]] & [[Marc Bonnet|Bonnet]], 1970</small> (West African catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus comoroensis]]'' <small>[[Leonard Joseph Victor Compagno|Compagno]], 1988</small> (Comoro catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus garmani]]'' <small>([[Henry Weed Fowler|Fowler]], 1934)</small> (Brownspotted catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus haeckelii]]'' <small>([[Alípio de Miranda-Ribeiro|A. Miranda-Ribeiro]], 1907)</small> (Freckled catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus hesperius]]'' <small>[[Stewart Springer|S. Springer]], 1966</small> (White-saddled catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus meadi]]'' <small>[[Stewart Springer|S. Springer]], 1966</small> (Blotched catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus retifer]]'' <small>([[Samuel Garman|Garman]], 1881)</small> (Chain catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus stellaris]]'' <small>([[Carl Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], 1758)</small> (Nursehound) * ''[[Scyliorhinus tokubee]]'' <small>[[Shirai Shigeru|Shirai]], [[Souichi Hagiwara|Hagiwara]] & [[Kazuhiro Nakaya|Nakaya]], 1992</small> (Izu catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus torazame]]'' <small>([[Shigeho Tanaka|S. Tanaka (I)]], 1908)</small> (Cloudy catshark) * ''[[Scyliorhinus torrei]]'' <small>[[Luis Howell-Rivero|Howell-Rivero]], 1936</small> (Dwarf catshark) * ''Scyliorhinus sp. X'' (Oakley's Catshark) ==See also== * [[List of prehistoric cartilaginous fish]] ==References== {{reflist}} * {{FishBase genus | genus = Scyliorhinus | month = February | year = 2011}} {{Scyliorhinidae}} [[Category:Scyliorhinidae]] {{Shark-stub}}
